He has had a hair salon and barbershop in a very busy area for 5 years; and with what he earns from his work, he manages to keep up with the household expenses.  He lives in his own house with his family.  

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of a new hair and beard trimmer, a mirror, and a chair, as he has a lot of business.  This way, he will be able to have better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase a new hair and beard trimmer, a mirror, and a chair.

loans.name: Sabastiao

texts.pt:
O Sr. Sebastiao de 23 anos de idade,solteiro  e tem 2 filhos que estao  a frequentar a escola no ensino primario. Ele e Operario  Agricola numa empresa de producao de banana a mais de 2 ano.
O presente emprestimo sera aplicado para compra de material de construcao ( chapas de zinco, barrotes, pedra e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade a construcao da sua casa.
texts.en:
Mr Sebastiao is 23 years old, single and has 2 children who go to primary school. He has been an agricultural worker at a banana production company for more than 2 years.

This loan will be used to buy construction material (sheets of zinc, beams, stone and to pay for labour) to continue building his house.

loans.use: buy construction material (sheets of zinc, beams, stone and to pay for labour) to continue building his house

loans.name: Duo Fuente Del Cielo Group

texts.es:
DUO FUENTE DEL CIELO
Doña Rutilia Magali es originaria del municipio de tecpan, ella tiene 38 años de edad bajo su responsabilidad están sus 3 hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías y a la crianza  de pollos.
Desde hace años ella empezó su propio negocio y gracias a Dios poco a poco a podido salir adelante, ya que con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo a logrado mejorar su negocio.
El esposo de ella trabaja como chofer y gracias al apoyo de el y el apoyo de sus hijos a podido salir adelante con su familia.
El sueño de ella es ampliar mas su negocio ofrecer otros productos a sus clientes ya que asi ella tendrá mejores ganancias y mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor.su compañera es Agustina de 57 años de edad.
texts.en:
The "Fuente del cielo" (Fountain of the Sky) Duo
Rutilia Magali is from the municipality of Tecpan. She is 38 years old and is responsible for her three young children. She makes artisan products and raises chickens. A few years ago, Rutilia Magali began her own business, and thanks to God, she has been getting ahead little-by-little. Through much work and effort she has been able to build her business. Her husband works as a chauffeur, and thanks to his support and the support of their children, they have been able to get their family ahead. 
Rutilia's dream is to grow her business even more and begin offering new products to her clients, which would enable her to earn more money and send her children to school for a better future.
Her business partner is Agustina, who is 57 years old.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to make artisan products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy daily needs items like beans, oil, peanuts, detergent, corn flour, chicken, and sugar.

loans.name: Geraldo

texts.pt:
O Sr. Geraldo de 26 anos de idade casado e pai de 1 filho  que esta  a frequentar a escola no ensino primario, sustenta a sua mae. Ele è motorista na empresa de producao de banana a mais de 4 anos.
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construcao ( area, blocos, barrote, chapas de zinco, cimento e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade com a construcao da sua casa.
O seu maior sonho é comprar uma viatura para usar  para o serviço e sua deslocação diárias e fazer com que seus filhos tenham melhor educacao melhor.
Diz que compromete se a honrar com o plano de repagamento, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seus planos.
texts.en:
Mr Geraldo is 26 years old, married and the father of 1 son who goes to primary school. He also supports his mother. He has been a driver at the banana production company for more than 4 years.

With this loan he will buy construction material (sand, bricks, beams, sheets of zinc, cement and pay for the labour) to continue to build his house.

His biggest dream is to buy a vehicle to use for work and to get around on a daily basis and to make sure his children get a better eduction.
He says he commits to honouring his repayment plan and will solicit further loans to realize his plans.

loans.use: buy construction material (sand, bricks, beams, sheets of zinc, cement and pay for the labour) to continue to build his house

loans.name: Eugene

texts.en:
Eugene runs a retail shop, mainly selling general merchandise such as plastics, sugar, and soap, among other items. He is aged fifty-six and a single father of five children; two attend school. 

He hopes to expand his business and pay school fees for his children like any loving father. He will use the loan to buy more salt and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy more salt and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Qurbonali

texts.ru:
Его зовут Курбонали. Ему 50 лет. Он муж и отец пятерых детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Курбонали с семей проживают в городе Душанбе. Он работает бухгалтером в одном из организаций города. У него хорошая работа. 
   В Таджикистане не каждый может получить образование и не каждая семья может дать образование своим детям. В свое время Курбонали поступил в ВУЗ, окончил Университет и сейчас он работает по специальности. Он хочет, чтобы его дочь тоже получила образование, нашла хорошую работу и строила карьеру, но из-за финансовых затруднений семьи стоит преграда в продолжении учебы. Курбонали не смог собрать достаточную сумму денег, чтобы оплатить учебный контракт дочери. Он просит кредит для оплаты учебного года и чтобы дочь смогла продолжить учебу. Курбонали заранее благодарен.
texts.en:
Qurbonali is 50 years old, married, and the father of five children.  The family lives in the city of Dusbanbe.   Qurbonali has a good job: he works as an accountant in one of the city's organizations. His wife is a homemaker. 

In Tajikistan, not everyone is fortunate enough to receive an education, and not every family has the means to pay for their children's education.  In his own youth, Qurbonali had the opportunity to attend an institution of higher education and to graduate from university, which is why he can now work in his own special field.  He now wants his daughter to receive an education, so that she can also find a good job and build a career.  However, the family's tight financial situation makes it difficult for his daughter to pursue her studies.  Qurbonali doesn't have the money necessary to pay for his daughter's tuition.  He is taking a loan to pay her yearly tuition fees, so that she can continue to study.  He thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to pay for his daughter's yearly tuition fees, so that she can pursue her studies.

loans.name: Halima

texts.ru: Женщину на фотографии зовут Халима. Ей 41 год. Она замужем. Ее муж работает в Гидро-электро станции "Рогун". Халима занимается продажей одежды. В торговом бизнесе она около 10 лет. Халима продает женскую и детскую одежду. Она любит свою работу и больше всего в работе ей нравиться общаться с людьми. Она общительная вежливая и очень хорошо знает свою работу. На данный момент Халиме необходимо привести новый товар зимней одежды. Ей не хватило $1000, чтобы обновить точку продажи новым товаром. Халима обратилась за кредитом, чтобы купить и привести зимнюю одежку на продажу.
texts.en:
The woman in the photograph is called Halima. She is 41 and married. Her husband works in the Rogun hydroelectric station. Halima works selling women's and children's clothing, a business she has has for about 10 years. She loves her work and most of all likes being able to interact with people. She is sociable and polite and very knowledgeable about her work. 

Halima currently needs to bring in new winter clothing merchandise. She is $1,000 short of what she needs to renew her inventory. She is requesting a loan in order to purchase and bring in winter clothing for sale.

loans.use: to purchase and ship new winter clothing inventory

loans.name: Vinera

texts.ru: Винера, 46 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей, старший сын и дочь живут вместе с Винерой. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, она 15 лет назад начала заниматься животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Винеры на сегодняшний день имеется 1 корова, 1 бычок, 1 лошадь, 35 овец, также 2,22 ГА собственной земли, где она выращивает фасоль, картофель, яблони и сафлор. Совокупный ежемесячный доход составляет от 14,000 сом до 21,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Винера обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одной коровы и 20 овец. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Vinera is 46 years old, married, and the mother of 4 children.  Her oldest son and daughter live with Vinera.  15 years ago, Vinera began working in animal husbandry and agriculture, beginning her business with 5,000 KGS.  Vinera's work serves as the primary source of income for her family.  Vinera now has 1 cow, 1 steer, 1 horse, 35 sheep, and also 2.22 hectares of land, on which she raises beans, potatoes, apples, and safflower.  Her monthly income ranges from 14,000 KGS to 21,000 KGS.  With the goal of growing her business, Vinera turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 150,000 KGS to purchase one cow and 20 sheep.  She plans to invest income from her loan into further expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase one cow and 20 sheep in order to invest in her livestock business

loans.name: Gracieta

texts.pt:
A Sr Gracieta de 41 anos de idade, casada e mae de 5 filhos dos quais 4 estao a frequentar a escola no ensino primario e secundario 1 e independente. Ela è negociante informal de produtos da 1ª necessidade, actividade que esta a explorar a mais de de 12 anos no seu estabelicimento comercial na sua casa.
Com o presente emprestimo sera aplicado para comprar material de construcao (blocos, cimento, varoes e pagamento de mao-de-obra) para dar continuidade com as obras.
texts.en: Gracieta, age 41, is married and the mother of five children, four of whom attend elementary or high school and one of whom is independent. She is a businesswoman selling daily needs items, a business she has been operating out of her home for over 12 years. With this loan she will buy construction materials such as blocks, cement, and rods, and pay for hired labor in order to continue with her improvement projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as blocks, cement, and rods, and to pay for hired labor.

loans.name: Albino

texts.pt: O  Albino é casado vive na casa propria pai de 5 filhos e dois netos e todos estes na sua responsabilidade,todos  vão a escola,o sr Albino trabalhou nas minas na Africa do Sul e agora reformado,soube da existencia da Hluvuku atraves de alguns vizinhos e decidiu  aproximar se para benefeciar se dos serviços que o banco oferecia  ja que a sua pensão  não satisfazia as necessidasdes da sua familia,agora foi concedido o emprestimo pela 3ª vez o de 40.000 para comprar pintos,ração,bebedouros e vacinas para começar com a criação de frangos de abate,diz que este negocio vai aumentar os rendimentos da sua familia e assim vai poder custear os estudos dos seus filhos sem problemas.O seu maior sonho pra o futuro é abrir uma ferragem para vender material de construção.O seu maior desafio é o custo elevado do material de construção.
texts.en: Albino is married and lives in his own house. He is the father of five children and has two grandchildren, all of whom he is responsible for and attend school.  Albino worked in the mines of South Africa, but is retired. He learned about Hluvuku through some neighbors and decided to join in order to benefit from the services offered by the bank, as his pension wasn't enough to provide for the needs of his family. This will now be his third loan, for 40,000 Meticais [MZN], and he plans to use it to buy chicks, feed, water dispensers, and vaccines, to start raising chickens for slaughter. This business will increase his family's income and allow him to cover his children's education costs without problems. His biggest dream for the future is to open a hardware store to sell construction materials. His main challenge is the high price of construction materials.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed, water dispensers, and vaccines, to start raising chickens for slaughter.

loans.name: Mukaddas

texts.ru:
Мукаддас 40 лет. Она живет в городе Кайракум, в северной части республики. Ее муж Аюбчон работает главным бухгалтером. Их сыновьям по 10 и 12 лет, они еще школьники. 
Мукаддас смышленая способная женщина. Она еще в юности у своей матери научилась ее ремеслу шитью. Лишь 5 лет назад она начала использовать свои знания и умения в области шитья. Мукаддас швейным делом занимается у себя на дому и берет заказ на пошив женских платьев национальных фасонов.  Она занимается этим делом одна, но иногда сестра помогает ей.  Для развития дела Мукаддас за счет кредита собирается приобрести модернизированную вышивальную машинку. Она надеется на вашу отзывчивость и поддержку.
texts.en: Mukaddas is 40 years old.  She lives in the city of Kayrakum, in the northern part of the country.  Her husband Ayubchon works as an accountant.  Their sons are 10 and 12 years old, and are still school-aged.  Mukaddas is a bright, capable woman.  When she was still young, Mukaddas learned the craft of sewing from her mother.  About 5 years ago she started to use her sewing knowledge and skills. Mukaddas sews in her home and tailors women's dresses (which are in the style of the national dress) to order.  She runs her business by herself, but sometimes her sister helps her.  In order to expand her business, Mukaddas is taking out a loan to buy a modern embroidery machine.  She is counting on your kindness and support.

loans.use: to purchase a modern embroidery machine

loans.name: Diana

texts.en:
Diana is 37 years old and married with three children, with all still in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Diana runs a business selling secondhand clothing, bed sheets, towels, and curtains in Teshie. She is requesting a GHS 1,600 loan through ID-Ghana to purchase secondhand clothing, bed sheets, towels, and curtains to sell to customers. 

Diana has been in this business for 13 years and sells a variety of items. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase secondhand clothing, bed sheets, towels and curtains to sell to customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To rebuild part of her house that is in disrepair.

loans.name: Mukhbira

texts.ru: Мухбира 40-летняя учительница, проживающая в городе Худжанд. Она кредитуется уже во второй раз(http://www.kiva.org/lend/624045). За счет прошлого кредита Мухбира оплатила учебный контракт сына. Также у нее имеется еще  дочки. Младшая ходит в садик, старшей дочки 18 лет, она поступила в Университет и теперь Мухбире необходимо оплачивать учебный контракт и своей дочери. Мухбиру удовлетворил условия и процесс кредитования в МДО "Хумо" и она снова решила обратиться за кредитом. За счет кредита она сможет оплатить образования своих детей. Мухбира верит, что ее поддержат, и заранее благодарит Вас!
texts.en: Mukhbira is a 40 year old teacher living in the city of Khujand.  She is receiving a loan for the second time (http://www.kiva.org/lend/624045); with her previous loan, Mukhbira was able to pay her son's tuition.  She also has daughters - her youngest goes to preschool, while the older daughter is 18 and started university.  Mukhbira now needs to pay tuition for her older daughter.  Mukhbira has satisfied the conditions for the lending process with MLO Humo, and she has decided to ask for a loan, which will allow her to pay for her children's educations.  Mukhbira believes that she will receive support, and thanks you all in advance!

loans.use: to pay her son and daughter's tuition

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es: La socia Sabina  se dedica al negocio de carpinteria,la socia vende muebles, sillas y camas, la socia vende en las diferentes ferias, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de carpintería. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar madera para hacer los muebles, sillas y camas.
texts.en:
Sabina has a carpentry business; she sells furniture, chairs, and beds, in different markets. She works  from 8:00 A.M. until 6:00 P.M. 

She has had this business for 8 years now, and it is going very well.  Her dream is to expand her carpentry business. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase wood, in order to make more furniture, chairs, and beds.

loans.use: to purchase wood in order to make furniture, chairs, and beds.

loans.name: Oyjamol

texts.ru: Ойчамол заботливая мать 4 детей. Она всегда старается для благополучия своих детей. Ее муж шофёр и его доход не хватает для обеспечения детей со всеми необходимыми средствами, поэтому Ойчамол решила организовать свой бизнес. Она планирует организовать бизнес шитьем и продажей женской одежды, так как она изучила местный рынок и сделала вывод, что ее бизнес будет развевать, так как спрос на местным рынке большой. Она научилась шитью женской одежды еще в юношеские годы. Она участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2400 сомони для покупки швейной машинке. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Oyjamol is the caring mother of 4 children, and is always striving for the good of her children.  Her husband is a chauffeur, but his income is not sufficient to secure all of the necessities for the children.  For this reason, Oyjamol decided to start her own business sewing and selling women's clothes.  She studied the local market and concluded that, because demand at the local market is high, her business will grow.  She began sewing women's clothing when she was still in her youth.  She participated in and received a certificate for the course "Bring it On", which was organized by the Association of Business Women.  She is asking for a loan of 2,400 TJS to purchase a sewing machine.  She awaits your kindness and is counting on your charity.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine to start her new business

loans.name: Dalmecia

texts.es: La socia  Dalmecia  se dedica al negocio de artesania, la socia vende  tejidos, chompas, mantas y telares, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante , el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos y telares. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos, chompas y telares.
texts.en: Dalmecia dedicates herself to her craft business.  She sells fabrics, sweaters, blankets and looms.  She hopes to get ahead through this business.  Her dream is to expand her fabric and loom-selling business.  She is seeking a loan to purchase fabrics, sweaters and looms.

loans.use: purchase fabrics, sweaters and looms.

loans.name: Christy

texts.en:
Christy is 28 years old, married with two children, and lives in Ramon Magsaysay Zamboanga del Sur with her family. She has a retail store that sells assorted groceries and beverages to generate additional income, while her husband works as a driver. 

Christy has been two years in this field. She is working well every day in order to provide income for the family and to help improve their living situation.

Christy requested this loan to purchase canned goods, soft drinks, and grains for sale in her store in order to increase her sales. 

She is aiming to develop her business and increase her profits so that she may open a bigger place and continue assisting her family with the additional income.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, soft drinks, and grains for sale in her store in order to increase her sales.

loans.name: Janatoy

texts.ru: Чанатой женщина-фермер в возрасте 45 лет, проживающая в районе А.Джоми. Она занята в сфере растениеводства в течение 3 лет. Раньше Чанатой работала на колхозе и там она научилась технике выращивания сельскохозяйственных культур. В данный момент Чанатой занимается и растениеводством и параллельно работает воспитателем в детском саде. Она удачно совмещает оба этих разных деятельностей. Муж Чанатой работает в ГЭС. В посеве и сборе урожая Чанатой помогают и муж и дети. Сейчас они активно готовятся к озимым посевам. Для этой цели Чанатой обратилась за кредитом. Она нуждается в данном кредите, так как без него не может приобрести семена и минеральные удобрения. Поддержите Чанатой!
texts.en: Janatoy is 45-year old female farmer living in the area of A. Jomi.  She has been working in agriculture for 3 years.  Earlier in her life, Janatoy worked on a collective farm, where she learned the techniques of raising crops.  Janatoy now raises crops and works as a kindergarten teacher.  She successfully combines both of these jobs.  Janatoy's husband works at a hydroelectric plant.  Janatoy's husband and children help her with planting and harvesting.  Right now Janatoy is actively preparing for the winter planting and for this reason is asking for a loan.  She needs this loan because, without it, she cannot purchase seeds or fertilizer.  Please help Janatoy!

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer for the winter planting

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: purchase merchandise such as shoes, sandals and cosmetics, as well as clothing such as blouses, shorts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Kabibi

texts.en:
Kabibi is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. She lives at her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past six years, Kabibi has operated a retail shop business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. Her potential customers are neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Kabibi dreams of establishing a wholesale business in the future. 

With the loan that Kabibi is requesting of KES 20,000, she wants to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour, and beans. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of wheat flour, maize flour, and beans

loans.name: Bati

texts.en:
Bati is a married woman; she has one child who attends school. Bati owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Bati has operated a charcoal selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a stiff competition from other charcoal operators in her business.
 
With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale

loans.name: Boaventura

texts.pt:
O Senhor Boaventura vive na casa do Estado com a sua esposa e sua filha menor de idade. Ele é trabalhado e com o presente emprestimo vai adiqurir um fogão a gás.
O seu sonho é ter uma casa proria e continuar com os estudos.
Ele tem como desafio trazer os pais que vivem muito distante dele, e devido a distância faz 4 anos que não os vê.
texts.en: Boaventura lives in public housing with his wife and young daughter. He is hard working and with this loan he will buy a gas stove. His dream is to have a house of his own and continue with his education. His challenge is in moving his parents, who live very far away. Due to the great distance, he hasn't seen them in four years.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a charcoal oven, a freezer, and ingredients to make pastries.

loans.name: Dúo Estrellitas De Tecpan Group

texts.es:
DUO ESTRELLITAS DE TECPAN
Doña carmelina es originaria de tecpan, ella tiene 24 años de edad, bajo su responsabilidad están sus dos hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano y a la crianza de pollos.
Ella a empezado su negocio desde hace algunos años y gracias a Dios a podido salir adelante con su negocio.
El esposo de ella trabaja como tejedor  de telares y gracias al apoyo de el ella sigue adelante con su negocio, ya que entre los dos se están ayudando para poder salir adelante con su familia.
El sueño  de ella es ampliar mas su negocio, hacer otros estilos de tejidos, y con el crédito ella compro materia prima para poder hacer otros tejidos asi tener mejores ganancias y mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor.su compañera es la señora Irma de 22 años de edad.
texts.en:
The "Estrellitas de Tecpan" Duo.

Carmelina is a native of Tecpan.  She is 24 years old and has two children under her care.  She works weaving traditional fabrics by hand and raising chickens.  She started her business a few years ago and thanks to God she has been able to get ahead with her business.  Her husband works on weaving looms, and thanks to his support, she is able to keep moving forward with her business since between the two of them, they help each other get ahead.  Her dream is to expand her business by making different styles of fabric.  With the loan she will purchase raw material to make more fabric so that she can increase her earnings and send her children to school so that they may have a better future.

Her partner is Irma, she is 22 years old.

loans.use: purchase raw material to make and sell traditional fabrics.

loans.name: Cacilda

texts.pt:
A Senhora Virginia vive na casa propria com o seu esposo e três filhos dos quais dois são menores de idade e um maior. Ela é policia, com o presente credito vai comprar material cimento, areia, chapa de construção para dar a continuidade coma a sua obra.
A cliente tem como sonho terminar a obra e o seu maior desafio é encorajar o seu esposo a deixar de ser dependente do alcool.
texts.en: Virginia lives in her own house with her husband and three children, two of whom are minors and one of whom is of age. She is a police officer. With this loan, she will buy construction materials such as cement, gravel, and sheet metal to continue her construction project. Her dream is to finish with her project and her main challenge is in encouraging her husband to overcome his dependence on alcohol.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement, gravel, and sheet metal to continue her construction project.

loans.name: Isela Damari

texts.es:
Isela de 39 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, esta casada. Su esposo trabaja de motorista y son padres de 6 hijos y todos viven con ellos, pero 3 de ellos ya trabajan y los demás asisten a la escuela técnica, ademas de sus hijos vive con ellos un nieto de 1 año que depende de su hija mayor.

Isela es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa femenina desde hace cinco años, aprendió el negocio ya que su mamá también se dedicaba a la venta de ropa y ella le ayudaba a vender en el lugar donde nació, ella realiza la actividad tres días a la semana.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar faldas, blusas, vestidos, ropa interior de mujer, ya que es lo que mas vende, ella considera que mejoraran sus ingresos porque con el préstamo tiene la oportunidad de ofrecer mas variedad de prendas de vestir a sus clientes.

 En el futuro quiere seguir trabajando en su negocio y espera que con mucho trabajo y financiamiento ampliara su mercadería y sus clientes, también sueña con ver a sus hijos casados para cuidar de sus nietos.
texts.en:
Isela, 39, studied until fifth grade.  She is married and her husband works as a driver.  They are the parents of six children and they all live with them, although three of them are already working while the rest attend a vocational school.  In addition to their children, a one-year old grandson, who is the son of their eldest daughter, lives with them.  Isela is a retailer who has worked selling women's clothing for the past five years.  She learned this trade from her mother who also worked selling clothing.  She used to help her sell clothing in the town that she was born in.  She now works three days a week.

The loan that she is seeking will be used to purchase skirts, blouses, dresses and women's underwear since it is what she sells the most of.  She thinks that this will improve her earnings because the loan will allow her to offer a greater variety of clothing to her customers.  In the future, she would like to continue working in her business and she hopes that with a lot of work and financing she will be able to expand her merchandise and customer base.  She also dreams of seeing her children married so that she can take care of her grandchildren.

loans.use: purchase skirts, blouses, dress and women's underwear since it is what she sells most.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es:
La socia Georgina se sigue dedicando al negocio de fabricación de tejas y también se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de granos secos, la socia vende trigo, cebada y maiz,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde puede vender los granos secos. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar maiz, trigo y cebada. 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Georgina continues working in the business of making tejas (sweets) and she also works selling dry grains. The member sells wheat, barley and corn. Georgina has had this business for many years and she is doing very well. Her dream is to have her own place where she can sell dry grains. She is requesting the loan to buy corn, wheat and barley. She is happy with the loan, and she promises to make the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn, wheat and barley.

loans.name: Erasmo

texts.pt: O Senhor Erasmo é casado vive com a esposa seus  filhos, sobrinho e a irma.  Ele é carpinteiro com o presente empréstimo quer adquirir barrotes para cobrir a sua casa. Tem  sonho de ver a sua casa concluida, com melhores condicoes habitacionais. Tem como maior desafio  ter mais financiamentos para o alcance dos seus sonhos.
texts.en: Erasmo is married and lives with his wife and their children, along with his nephew and a sister. He is a carpenter and with this loan he will buy rafters to put a roof on his house. His dream is to see his house completed, and in a better condition. His main challenge is in improving his finances so he can pursue his dreams.

loans.use: to buy rafters to put a roof on his house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy products such as: children's shoes, high and low heel sandals, boys and girls' clothing, women and men clothing such as blouses, t-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Clemente

texts.pt: O Senhor Clemente é casado vive com a esposa   seus tres  filhos.  Ele é militar, com o presente empréstimo quer adquirir chapas e barrotes para a cobertura da sua casa . Tem  sonho de terminr a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para o transporte pessoal. Tem como maior desafio trabalhar cada vez mais.
texts.en: Clemente is married and lives with his wife and their three children. He is in the military. With this loan he wants to buy sheet metal and beams for a roof on his house. He dreams of finishing the work on his house and owning a car for his personal use. His main challenge is to keep working harder and harder.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal and beams for a roof on his house.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a 44-year-old man married to Joyce who adds additional income to support their family. They are blessed with four children. James has been running a motorcycle repair shop, which has been in operation for five years, earning an income of KES 10,000 at the end of every month.

James is now servicing his second loan of KES 30,000 with VisionFund Kenya to buy window screens, panels, wheels and tires to sell to his customers on a daily basis. 

James plans to use the anticipated income to buy his own plot and hopes to expand his business and have a bright future.

loans.use: To buy window screens, panels, tires and wheels

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is a 51-year-old married woman with four children living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. She has been working in goat and cattle rearing, buying, and selling for many years. Joy earns additional income from a retail shop, selling home items. 

Joy is faced with the problem of a lack of land to expand her grazing area. She is requesting a loan to buy more goats and cattle for selling this festive season.

loans.use: to buy more goats and cattle for selling this festive season.

loans.name: Nadzuwa

texts.en:
This is Nadzuwa. She previously accessed a loan that she used to buy additional food stuff for her cafe. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures. 

Nadzuwa would like to apply for another KES 50,000 loan to buy additional stock of wheat flour, maize flour, rice, and sugar. The more items displayed on the menu, the better. Her profit from her business will definitely help her to provide for her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with happiness and thankfulness in her heart.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of wheat flour, maize flour, rice, and sugar

loans.name: Mohammad Rehman

texts.en:
A young and enthusiastic entrepreneur, Mohammad Rehman runs a clothing business in Karachi. He is 26, married, and blessed with one child. He is gaining more experience with time and has improved his business a lot. He is organized and disciplined.

Mohammad Rehman wants to boost his sales. For this purpose, he has requested a loan to get more established and improve his living standards and give his child a quality education.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes in bulk

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
El socio Guillermo se sigue dedicandp al negocio de transporte, el socio tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi, el socio trabaja 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es comprarse un carro nuevo. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar repuestos para su carro.

 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Guillermo continues to drive a taxi, as he's done for the past seven years. Business is strong, and Guillermo hopes to buy a new car. He's now applying for a loan to purchase spare parts for the taxi that he currently drives.  

Guillermo is pleased that he has the opportunity to obtain this loan and is committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials like window grates and beauty products for her boutique.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is married with three children. She grows and harvests rice, work that she has done since she was married. Her husband works in a private company as a security guard since it is the only way they have to move the family forward. She gets up early and has to go to the fields where she oversees her tenants as well as her crops.
 
Jenelyn is requesting this loan to purchase fertilizer, since her farm needs improvement.  In the future, she wants to have a better house than she has now and to be able to give her children the education she did not have. She is sure that she can achieve her goals with the help of these loans.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to improve her farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to fix the roof of her house for better safety.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel does a motorcycle transport business in Kisumu town and has been running this business for seven years now. He is 27 years old, married and together with his spouse, he has have been blessed with one child. He also supports three people in his family.

He will use this loan to buy spare parts for servicing his motorcycle so it can be in good condition for the business. He will use the anticipated profits to save and buy a new motorcycle.

This is his first loan from VisionFund Kenya and in the future, he hopes to buy a new motorcycle and expand his business.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for servicing and repairing his motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To replace his motorcycle with new brakes, tires, and tubes.

loans.name: Hermenegildo

texts.pt:
O Senhor Hermenegildo maritalmente e tem uma filha menor de idade. Ele é comerciante por conta propria e com o presente emprestimo vai adiquirir um congelador para a sua barraca.   
O seu maior sonho é trabalhar como contabilista visto que ele foi formado nessa area, mas tem muitas dificuldades em consiguir o emprego.
texts.en: Hermenegildo is married and has a young daughter. He is a self-employed vendor and with this loan he will buy a freezer for his stand. His biggest dream is to work as an accountant, as he was trained in this field, but he has many difficulties in finding a job.

loans.use: to buy a freezer for his stand.

loans.name: Dúo Dios Bendito Group

texts.es:
DUO DIOS BENDITO
Este dúo está conformado por Gloria es soltera y vive en Sumpango, ella se dedica a la agricultura de verduras, desde hace años ella se dedica al cultivo, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de semillas y abono para su siembra espera que le puedan dar el apoyo que esta solicitando a Kiva.su compañero es Danny de 20 años de edad.
texts.en:
DUO DIOS BENDITO (BLESSED GOD DUO)
This duo is comprised of Gloria, a single woman living in Sumpango.  She makes her living farming vegetables and has been doing so for two years.  She is requesting this loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for her sowing and hopes that she will be given the support that she is requesting from Kiva.  Her co-member is Danny who is 20 years old.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to farm vegetables.

loans.name: Ines

texts.pt:
A Senhora Ines é casada e tem uma filha menor de idade, vive na casa propria com a sua familia. Ela é funcionaria e dona de um estabelecimento comercial, tem como objectivo aumentar os seus rendimentos, pra tal com o presente empréstimo vai adiquirir produtos alimentares para a sua barraca. 
Tem como desafio continuar com os estudos, visto que, teve que interromper devido a  gravidez.
texts.en: Ines is married and has an under-age daughter. She lives in her own house with her family. She is a clerical worker and owner of a business. Her objective is to increase her earnings by using this loan to buy food products for her stall. Her challenge is in continuing with her education, given that she had to drop out due to hardship.

loans.use: to buy food products for her stand.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is thankful that she was granted a 25,000 PHP loan, which she used to buy personal direct sales products. From her store earnings, she has been able to send her child to school and meet their daily living expenses. She also was able to open a small general store.

Evelyn would now like to apply for a 30,000 PHP loan, which she will use to buy merchandise such as foot wear and bags to sell. Part of the loan will be used to buy grocery items such as  rice, coffee, soda, rice noodles, and beverages to sell at her small general store. Evelyn is positive she will earn a good return on her investment. Her income from her store is a stable source to meet her family's basic needs and for the education of her child. She thanks God and you, in advance, for the financial help that will be given her. 

Evelyn dreams of having her own place to display her direct sales products and her food items. She wants the best for her child and to live a godly and happy life. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional supplies and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Susuana

texts.en:
Susuana is 44 years old and resides in her family house. She is a woman who has the will to get ahead. Susuana saw that there was a need for the sale of fry yams, potatoes, and chicken wings. Thanks to her business savvy and her friendliness, she has been able to stay in operation. 

Susuana’s business is known for the kindness of its owner and the excellent service offered to its customers. Susuana wants to invest in her business so that she can continue serving her customers in the best manner possible. She is requesting a loan from ID Ghana so that she can buy fry yams, potatoes, chicken wings, and other products. Susuana will be able to maintain the variety of products that she is known for offering.

loans.use: To buy fry yams, potatoes, chicken wings, and other products.

loans.name: Rosalio

texts.es: El socio Rosalio se sigue dedicando al negocio de transporte, el socio tiene un taxi donde hace servicio público, el socio trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es tener un carro nuevo. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar llantas para su carro.
texts.en: Rosalio continues to work in the transportation industry. He has a taxi with which he transports people. He starts working at 6:00 a.m. and finishes at 7:00 p.m. He has had this occupation for several years and does very well. His dream is to have a new car. He is requesting this loan to buy tires for his car.

loans.use: to buy tires for his car.

loans.name: Picaflor Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PICAFLOR” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya, está compuesta por diez  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Virginia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: producción de frutas, venta de frutas, tienda de barrio, carnicería, venta de comida.
 
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Virginia es integrante, ella indica que es el primer año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un Asesor de la institución que fue a visitarle a su domicilio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida (pollos); nos cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió de su madre, quien le guío para la implementación del mismo, con un pequeño capital decidió ampliar su negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de cocina  y plancha industrial) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la Ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro y el crédito que ofrece la institución
texts.en:
The "Picaflor" community association will begin the first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Patacamaya Focal Center. It is composed of 10 members and is managed by an executive board of which Virgina is the President. The association's members' businesses are diverse and include: fruit production, fruit sale, a convenience store, a butcher's shop, and food sale.

This loan will benefit small entrepreneurs. Virginia is one of them -- this is the first year she participates in Pro Mujer. She was invited by an association consultant that visited her home. She currently has a business selling food (chicken). She learnt this business from her mother, who provided advice for the business implementation. She decided to enlarge her business with a small amount of money.

The loan she has requested is intended to increase her capital (purchase of a kitchen and an industrial iron that she will acquire from saleswomen in the city of La Paz) and will help with the elaboration and commercialization of her products. This work allows her to generate income to support her family, as she is in a common law relationship and has four children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the opportunity to save and the credit that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy a kitchen and an industrial iron.

loans.name: Erick

texts.en:
Erick is 44 years old, married, and together with his spouse he has been blessed with seven children. He is a farmer in Kisumu town where he grows vegetables, onions, and tomatoes for sale. He has been in this business for ten years and it has been profitable.

He plans to use this loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for planting on his farm. He will use the anticipated profits to grow his farming business and also repay the loan. 

This is Erick's first loan term from VisionFund Kenya and his future hopes are to grow his business and be successful, increase his income and be able to improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Kavule Kwekamba Women's Group

texts.en:
Janet, whose hand is raised in the group photograph, is a twenty-nine-year-old married woman with two children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. 

Janet deals in selling cocoa and fresh foods and has been in this business since 2009. She is a hardworking woman who wishes to expand her business and educate her children. Seasonality is her major challenge, but she tries as much as possible to keep her business running amidst those challenges.

Janet wants a loan to buy cocoa for selling.

loans.use: to buy cocoa for selling

loans.name: Syed Ali Arshad

texts.en:
Syed is 49 years old, married, and a father of two children. He lives in Karachi. He is in the manufacturing business where he makes steel doors and window panels. He has been doing this for 15 years now. He has established himself well in the market and has many customers. He wants to make his business self-sufficient. 

He has requested a loan to get the financing needed to buy more steel. This investment will help him boost his sales and become successful. Syed is hopeful that his hard work will pay off and he will be rewarded in the future and increase his living standards.

loans.use: to buy steel for manufacturing doors and windows.

loans.name: In God Group

texts.en:
These members are part of a group made up of two members with an average age of 45 and, on average, two children. They live in traditional extended families in the district of Accra in the town of Teshie-Accra. They got to know each other thanks to neighborly and business relationships and friendships. They joined the MFI ID-Ghana in order to strengthen their financial capacity so that they could do business better and are on their sixth loan. The five previous loans have been correctly repaid.

Victoria, the group representative standing first from the left in the picture, sells yams, cassava, tomatoes, fish etc. She plans to use her loan to buy more yams, cassava, tomatoes, and fish from the Accra market. She makes her sales by going door-to-door, for cash or credit, to mixed retail clients. She expects to make a good monthly profit, which she will use to repay the loan and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy more yams, cassava, tomatoes, and fish from the market.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sandwich materials such as eggs, sugar, flour, potatoes, tang, and other items to make different kinds of sandwiches to sell.

loans.name: Dúo Fortaleza De Dios Group

texts.es:
DUO FORTALEZA DE DIOS
Este dúo está conformado por Luz Estela de 32 años de edad es originaria de Sumpango doña Luz es casada se dedica a la venta de ropa típica es ambulante pero ella sueña con tener un local para poder surtir el negocio con mercaderia en ropa tipica y ya no salir a ofrecer en las calles, pero necesita de capital para poder lograr su objetivo, por lo que solicita un crédito a kiva para poder realizar sus deseo que es de poder incrementar sus ventas.su compañera Genni Marleny de 21 años de edad.
texts.en: The "Fortaleza de Dios" duo is composed of Luz Estela and Genni Marleny. Luz Estela is 32 years old and comes from Sumpango. She is married and works selling traditional clothing. She is a street vendor but dreams of having her own store to be able to stock it with traditional clothing and not have to sell her products on the street. She needs capital to be able to achieve her goal, which is why she is requesting a Kiva loan to accomplish her wish to increase her sales. Her partner Genni Marleny is 21 years old.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing for sale.

loans.name: Yhasmany

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de cigarrillos,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es tener su tienda de abarrotes.El socio solicita el credito para comprar cigarrillos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower continues to work in his business selling cigarettes.  He has already been working in this business for several years and is doing well.  The borrower's dream is to have his own grocery store.  The member is requesting the loan to buy cigarettes.

The member is happy about the loan and agrees to comply with the payments.

loans.use: to buy cigarettes.

loans.name: Procorpio Jr

texts.en:
Procorpio Jr, 48, is married with one child. He manages his own farm for a living. He has been planting and harvesting rice for over eleven years. He successfully repaid repaid his previous loan, which he used for farm fertilization.

Procorpio Jr's farm is doing well and he earns a better income, which enabled him to buy a second-hand motorcycle. Recently, he took a new loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy fertilizer and new tires for his vehicle, which is used for a motorcycle transport business. He wants to have a comfortable house and improved living situation for his entire family in the near future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and new tires for his vehicle, which is used for a motorcycle transport business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more new, stylish women's clothes to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Lisseth Maria

texts.es: Lisseth es una mujer emprendedora, de éxito tiene 40 años de edad, acompañada, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes desde hace tres años, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceites, embutidos, avenas, frijoles, gaseosas, etc. La cliente lleva dos ciclos trabajando con la institución y ha demostrado ser una persona trabajadora y responsable en los días de pagos.
texts.en: Lisseth is a successful, enterprising 40-year-old woman, living with her partner, who has been making her living selling groceries for three years.  She will use the loan to buy rice, sugar, oils, cold cuts, oats, beans, sodas, etc.  The borrower has had three loans with the organization and has shown that she is hardworking and responsible on the payment dates.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oils, cold cuts, oats, beans, sodas, etc.
